reviews.name: Emily Johnson
reviews.comment: The product exceeded my expectations. The material feels premium, the design is elegant, and the packaging was very professional. Delivery was faster than I thought, and I’ll definitely purchase again.

reviews.name: Michael Smith
reviews.comment: Overall, a very good product. It matches the description perfectly and feels durable. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the instructions could have been a little clearer for setup.

reviews.name: Sophia Martinez
reviews.comment: The item is okay but not exactly what I was expecting. The color looks slightly different compared to the photos online, and the texture feels a bit rough. It’s usable, but I wouldn’t call it great.

reviews.name: James Anderson
reviews.comment: Absolutely fantastic experience! The seller was responsive, the delivery was quick, and the quality of the product is top-notch. I’ve already recommended it to several friends.

reviews.name: Olivia Brown
reviews.comment: I was quite disappointed with this purchase. The product did not match the description, and it felt cheaply made. I had to return it, which was a hassle, although customer service was polite.

reviews.name: William Thompson
reviews.comment: Good value for the price. It’s not perfect, but it performs well enough for daily use. I appreciate the simple design, but I hope they improve the durability in future versions.

reviews.name: Isabella Garcia
reviews.comment: I am really happy with this product. It looks even better in real life than in the pictures. The packaging was secure, and it arrived without any damage. Definitely worth every penny.

reviews.name: Daniel Wilson
reviews.comment: The product works fine, but there are some minor issues with the finish. It’s a bit overpriced for what it offers, but still acceptable if you don’t mind small imperfections.

reviews.name: Ava Taylor
reviews.comment: Pretty solid purchase overall. I like the functionality and the style. The shipping took a little longer than expected, but once it arrived, everything was in perfect condition.

reviews.name: Liam White
reviews.comment: This is one of the best purchases I’ve made online. The quality is excellent, and it feels very durable. Customer support was also very helpful when I had a small question.

faqs.question: Kargo ne kadar sürede gelir?
faqs.answer: Siparişleriniz 1-3 iş günü içinde kargoya verilir, teslimat bölgenize göre 2-5 iş günü sürebilir.

faqs.question: İade süresi ne kadar?
faqs.answer: Ürünlerinizi teslim aldıktan sonra 14 gün içerisinde koşulsuz iade edebilirsiniz.

faqs.question: Ödeme yöntemleri nelerdir?
faqs.answer: Kredi kartı, banka kartı, kapıda ödeme ve havale/EFT yöntemlerini kullanabilirsiniz.

faqs.question: Ürünleri mağazadan teslim alabilir miyim?
faqs.answer: Evet, sipariş sırasında 'Mağazadan Teslim Al' seçeneğini seçebilirsiniz.

faqs.question: Ürünleriniz garantili mi?
faqs.answer: Evet, tüm ürünlerimiz üretici garantisi kapsamındadır. Garanti süresi ürün türüne göre değişebilir.

faqs.question: Kargo ücreti ne kadar?
faqs.answer: 150₺ üzeri siparişlerde kargo ücretsizdir. Altındaki siparişlerde kargo ücreti sabit 29₺'dir.

faqs.question: Siparişimi nasıl takip edebilirim?
faqs.answer: Hesabınıza giriş yaparak 'Siparişlerim' bölümünden kargo takip numaranızı görebilirsiniz.

faqs.question: Ürün stokta yoksa ne yapabilirim?
faqs.answer: Stokta olmayan ürünler için 'Stok Gelince Haber Ver' seçeneğini kullanabilirsiniz.

faqs.question: Hediye paketi yapıyor musunuz?
faqs.answer: Evet, sipariş sırasında 'Hediye Paketi' seçeneğini işaretleyerek ürününüzü paketletebilirsiniz.

faqs.question: Müşteri hizmetlerine nasıl ulaşabilirim?
faqs.answer: 7/24 destek hattımızdan veya info@siteadi.com e-posta adresimizden bize ulaşabilirsiniz.
